0 rem !to "build/boot.prg"
10 print chr$(147);:poke53280,0:poke53281,15:poke646,6
20 poke 56,92:rem top of basic
30 poke 650,128:rem keyboard repeat
40 poke 652,0:rem delay before repeat
100 :
110 rem sprite initializer
120 :
200 poke 53285,2:rem multicolor 1
210 poke 53286,0:rem multicolor 2
220 poke 53269,255:rem set all 8 sprites visible
230 poke 53276,255:rem multicolor mode
235 :
236 rem load sprite pixel data
237 :
240 b=0:for i=16384 to 16384+767
250 read j
260 poke i,j
270 b=b+.015625:poke53280,b
280 next i
290 poke 53287,1:rem main color white
1000 :: rem frame 1 down

10010 print"load";q$;"walking-main";q$;",8"
10020 printd$;d$;d$;d$;"run"
10025 rem load keyboard buffer and flush it
10030 poke631,19:poke632,13:poke633,13:poke198,3
